parameters.limit: Maximum number of contacts to return

nylasCreateContact.description: Creates a new contact in Google Contacts

nylasUpdateContact.description: Updates an existing contact in Google Contacts

nylasGetContactById.description: Retrieves a single contact from Google Contacts by its ID

nylasDeleteContact.description: Safely deletes a contact with audit trail. Soft delete by default, hard delete optional.

parameters.deletionReason: Optional reason for deletion (for audit trail)
parameters.confirmHardDelete: Set to true to permanently delete from Google Contacts (default: false)

nylasSearchContacts.description: Search contacts by name, email, phone, or company

parameters.name: Search by first or last name (partial match)

nylasFindDuplicates.description: Finds duplicate contacts based on email or name matching

parameters.limit: Maximum number of contacts to scan (default: 100)

nylasSearchContactsByTags.description: Search contacts that have specific tags in metadata

parameters.tags: Array of tags to search for (AND logic - must have all)

parameters.lifecycle: Lifecycle stage (lead, prospect, customer, partner, inactive)

nylasCreateContactGroup.description: Creates a new contact group for organizing contacts

nylasGetContactGroup.description: Retrieves details of a specific contact group

nylasDeleteContactGroup.description: Deletes a contact group and removes it from all contacts

nylasAddContactToGroup.description: Adds a contact to a group

nylasRemoveContactFromGroup.description: Removes a contact from a group
